Uses of Interface
rt.Intersectable

  • Packages that use Intersectable 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.intersectables
    Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
    rt.lightsources
    Implementations of the LightGeometry interface.

      Classes in rt.intersectables that implement Intersectable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggregate
      A group of Intersectable objects.
      class  CSGCube
      A cube implemented using planes and CSG.
      class  CSGDodecahedron
      A dodecahedron implemented using planes and CSG.
      class  CSGNode
      A CSG node combines two CSG solids using a set operation, such as intersection, addition, or subtraction.
      class  CSGPlane
      A plane for CSG operations.
      class  CSGSolid
      A CSG solid object that can be intersected by a ray.
      class  Mesh
      A triangle mesh.
      class  MeshTriangle
      Defines a triangle by referring back to a Mesh and its vertex and index arrays.
      class  Plane
      A plane that can be intersected by a ray.
